parameters.name: Period
parameters.description:
The subscription duration. Unit: months. This parameter is required if you switch the billing method to subscription. Valid values:

*   1 to 9
*   12
*   24
*   36

parameters.name: ProductCode
parameters.description: The code of the service to which the instance belongs.

parameters.name: ProductType
parameters.description: The type of the service to which the instance belongs.

parameters.name: SubscriptionType
parameters.description:
The billing method of the instance. Valid values:

*   Subscription: subscription
*   PayAsYouGo: pay-as-you-go

>  After the call is successful, the billing method of the instance is switched.
